Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Fire control computer error. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Weapon Release component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
